title: Average hours spent watching TV weekly in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2015
summary: Overall Share of respondents has decreased over the Year.
Share of respondents is slightly decreasing from 5_hours_or_less to I_don't_watch_TV.
The line drastically increased by 2.0 times from Year 5_hours_or_less to 6_to_10_hours, and lastly, decreased by 9.0 times from Year 6_to_10_hours to I_don't_watch_TV.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 6_to_10_hours and I_don't_watch_TV.
The highest Share of respondents, of value 18.0 was reached at Year 6_to_10_hours
The lowest Share of respondents, of value 2.0 was reported at Year I_don't_watch_TV
